expo.name: Infy.Money PFM
expo.description: Infy.Money Personal Finance Management App. The app was developed as a part of Setu.co - Free Your Data hackathon. InfyMoney is a marketplace & advisory which allows Millennials & Gen-Zs to intuitively track, manage & grow their financial health & wealth by seamlessly aggregating Bank, Investment, Loan & Insurance accounts under single interface and ease discovery of needed related products though marketplace and selection of right products using robo advisory.
